message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think it's only fair for me to get a slightly larger share this time since the value decreases faster for you.
Considering the inflation, I'll take a bit more this time, but still a good deal for you
Alice, the inflation is working against you more than me. This is my final offer in this range, let's close the deal and both benefit.
Inflation is biting, but I still think I deserve the larger share, meet me in the middle
Alice, this is a very reasonable offer considering the inflation. I'm willing to compromise, but I need you to meet me halfway. Time is running out.
